events.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs was acquitted of racketeering and sex trafficking charges but convicted on two lesser counts related to transportation of women for prostitution.
The 49th edition of the iconic fireworks display featured 80,000 shells and a new 1,400-foot twinkling yellow waterfall effect.
Joey Chestnut reclaimed his title in the men’s division, marking his 13th overall win, while Miki Sudo secured her third consecutive and 11th overall win in the women’s division.

events.eventName: Summer Streets — Expanded for NYC’s 400th Anniversary
events.description: Summer Streets returned bigger than ever—spanning over 400 blocks, transforming major streets into car-free zones with entertainment, fitness, and art.

events.eventName: Jazz Age Lawn Party on Governors Island
events.description: The Prohibition-era themed event celebrated its 20th anniversary with live jazz, vintage cars, dance lessons, retro cocktails, and flapper-era style.
The annual Grand Slam featured viral fan incidents, heartwarming proposals, and celebrity sightings.
The outbreak resulted in 114 cases, 90 hospitalizations, and seven deaths, traced to cooling towers at Harlem Hospital and a nearby construction site.
